snippet: Bayer Diabetes Care has marketed and sold products manufactured by Panasonic Healthcare for decades.
abstract: DealBook Online; Panasonic Healthcare Holdings agrees to buy Bayer's diabetes care business for 1.02 billion euros, or about $1.15 billion.
lead_paragraph: Bayer Diabetes Care has marketed and sold products manufactured by Panasonic Healthcare for decades.

headline.main: Panasonic Healthcare to Buy Bayer’s Diabetes Business for $1.15 Billion
